title: Womens Maxi Dress Formal

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous, particularly noting its rose gold color, and appreciate its quality as a perfect choice for special occasions. The glitter receives mixed feedback - while it sparkles beautifully in sunlight, customers report it falls off during wear. Customers disagree on the sizing, with some finding it fits beautifully while others say it's too small. The dress receives negative feedback for being itchy and uncomfortable, with customers describing the material as cheap and poor quality. While some find it impressive for the price, others express concerns about its durability, with one customer reporting issues with the boning coming out. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what you need for an evening of elegance.
items.body: I’m 5’3” and 172lbs, hourglass body shape, (42” bust, 36” waist and 47” hips) Ordered a size 14 and it fits beautifully. However, I’ll have to cut about 20cms since it’s too long and I’m too short, but I will wear this for my brother’s wedding next April. It looks simply astonishing... no need to wear bra, probably will use sticky pads to pull my girls up. I ordered 8-10 dresses and this was the only one I was 100% satisfied with. Now, it’s more expensive than the other dresses, but I can clearly see why. It’s heavier than you might think, just keep that in mind.I’ll update with pictures when I’m ready to wear it! Warning: it is tried that you’ll have a massive amount of glitter falling from the dress wherever you go. I had to sweep the WHOLE house after trying it on. The day of the wedding, I’ll just have it in the bag and put it on on the restroom of the wedding place. Read more
items.author: Diana Copher

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Plastic- Glue like feel
items.body: Material was glue and very itchy. It was pretty from a distance but not practical Read more
items.author: ⚓️❤️Y❤️⚓️

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Rose gold is luxe —love it.
items.body: 5’9”/170/36DD purchased in rose gold size 14. Measurements 41/31/39 Flattering & feminine. This was the perfect dress for the occasion at the right price. It was gloriously long enough on me (I never find dresses long enough because I’m tall) Be advised, you will leave a trail of glitter EVERYWHERE, but you won’t care, because people will be complimenting you all day on this gorgeous dress. Read more
items.author: mac girl*

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful but painful…
items.body: The dress looks beautiful, but within an hour of wearing it, the boning started coming out and sticking my arms and underarm. By the time I got home I had all these painful scrapes on my underarms. Read more
items.author: Troy Wong

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks great, but very uncomfortable
items.body: Fits well, looks great. For the price, I would expect the quality to be a little better. I bought this for a cosplay so I’ll only be wearing it for a short period of time, so it works for my purposes. But I don’t think I’d be able to wear this for an actual event, because it is extremely harsh and scratchy, and a glitter explosion every time you move. I’m 5’2” and with 5 inch heels it’s still pretty long, so it may require alterations if you’re a shorty like me. Read more
items.author: danielle gordon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome gown
items.body: I am 5'10" 155lbs and ordered a size 12. It fit perfectly with the exception of the straps being a little loose but I am also small chested so that is why. Great quality and super sparkly. In the sunlight it really sparkles. Highly recommend. Read more
items.author: Robin

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Chest is just pink bra cups
items.body: Such a pretty dress, but the chest is just circular pink bra cups you would get at the hobby store sewn in. Since the chest area is sheer fabric, you can see the circle outline that looks like two sewn-in pasties. It ruins what would be an otherwise classy dress. I'm a size 4-6 in most formal gowns, and in this one the size 6, 8, and 10 were too tight around the ribcage. I could not zip it up. The 10 was also too large in the chest. My band size is only a 32 inch so this is really odd sizing. Read more
items.author: Brooklyn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive for the price, looked amazing
items.body: I followed the size chart and the dress fit perfectly. For the cost, this dress is spectacular. Two people stopped and asked me if if was from Nordstrom. They were blown away when I told them amazon and the price. It does shed some glitter but that’s the only negative thing I can say and to be fair, what would you expect - it’s a glitter covered dress! Read more
items.author: M. & A. U.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Gold, Navy, Black Multi, Purple, Rose Gold, Strapless Rose Gold, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
